```py
>>> s = pd.Series([1, 2], index=["a", "b"])
>>> s
a    1
b    2
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> s_copy = s.copy()
>>> s_copy
a    1
b    2
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> s = pd.Series([1, 2], index=["a", "b"])
>>> deep = s.copy()
>>> shallow = s.copy(deep=False) 
```

```py
>>> s is shallow
False
>>> s.values is shallow.values and s.index is shallow.index
True 
```

```py
>>> s is deep
False
>>> s.values is deep.values or s.index is deep.index
False 
```

```py
>>> s.iloc[0] = 3
>>> shallow.iloc[1] = 4
>>> s
a    3
b    4
dtype: int64
>>> shallow
a    3
b    4
dtype: int64
>>> deep
a    1
b    2
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> with pd.option_context("mode.copy_on_write", True):
...     s = pd.Series([1, 2], index=["a", "b"])
...     copy = s.copy(deep=False)
...     s.iloc[0] = 100
...     s
a    100
b      2
dtype: int64
>>> copy
a    1
b    2
dtype: int64 
```
